### Contact Us

1. 114 S. Central Street  
   Ferris, TX 75125
2. Phone: [972-544-2110](tel:9725442110)
3. **Municipal Court & Utility Billing**Monday - Thursday 7:30 AM - 5:00 PM  
   **Public Library**Monday - Thursday 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM  
   **All Other Non-Public Safety Departments**Monday - Thursday: 7:30 AM - 5:30 PM

   \*All Non-Public Safety Offices Are Closed Friday through Sunday\*
